divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend were outside. We saw three lights flying in a ^ formation. Heavy cloud cover, they were bright enough to shine through. we expected at least 24. We have crude cell phone vidieo that just showslight. They were red. They seemed to form a triangle a bit more to the south west but we could not see do to tree cover. they match the other reports with red pulsating lights. We found this link over twitter,
